questions.question: To what extent do you experience repeated, disturbing memories, thoughts, or images of a stressful experience from the past?
How much do you experience repeated, disturbing dreams of a stressful experience from the past?
To what degree do you suddenly act or feel as if a stressful experience were happening again (as if you were reliving it)?
How strongly do you feel upset when something reminds you of a stressful experience from the past?
How much do you have physical reactions (e.g., heart pounding, trouble breathing, or sweating) when something reminds you of a stressful experience from the past?
To what extent do you avoid thinking about or talking about a stressful experience from the past or avoid having feelings related to it?
How often do you avoid activities or situations because they remind you of a stressful experience from the past?
How much trouble do you have remembering important parts of a stressful experience from the past?
To what extent have you experienced a loss of interest in things that you used to enjoy?
How much do you feel distant or cut off from other people?
To what degree do you feel emotionally numb or unable to have loving feelings for those close to you?
How much do you feel as if your future will somehow be cut short?
How much trouble do you have falling or staying asleep?
How often do you feel irritable or have angry outbursts?
How much difficulty do you have concentrating?
To what extent do you find yourself being super alert or watchful on guard?
How much do you feel jumpy or easily startled?
